Formula Usage Guide

Use formulas to calculate values or filter accounts. Here are some examples:

Account Filtering Examples:
  • ["account.account_category", "in", ["Assets", "Liabilities"]] - Filter by category
  • ["account.account_type", "=", "Cash"] - Filter by account type
  • ["account.root_type", "in", ["Asset", "Liability"]] - Filter by root type
Calculation Examples:
  • A100 + A200 - Add values from reference codes A100 and A200
  • B100 - B200 - Subtract B200 from B100
  • (A100 + A200) * 0.1 - Calculate 10% of combined values

Note: Use reference codes (Reference Code field) to reference other rows in calculations.
